Desc.entry: Open to anyone who is Welsh, has Welsh connections or is interested in Wales and its people. Aims to promote an interest in Wales and to provide a social base for its members. Holds St David's Day dinner on 1st March or nearest Saturday. Various other activities held throughout the year including Presidents Reception at Tapton Masonic Hall, President at Home afternoon, summer picnic, Christmas carol service and buffet lunch, morning walks followed by a pub lunch and talks on a variety of topics on Friday evenings.

category.entry: BLACK AND MINORITY ETHNIC PEOPLE - COMMUNITY ORGANISATIONS
